Baffling End.name: Baffling End
Baffling End.text:
When Baffling End enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls with converted mana cost 3 or less.
When Baffling End leaves the battlefield, target opponent creates a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.

Bishop of Binding.name: Bishop of Binding
Bishop of Binding.text:
When Bishop of Binding enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Bishop of Binding leaves the battlefield.
Whenever Bishop of Binding attacks, target Vampire gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the power of the exiled card.

Blazing Hope.flavor: "No shadow remains for you to hide in." —Caparocti Sunborn
Blazing Hope.name: Blazing Hope
Blazing Hope.text: Exile target creature with power greater than or equal to your life total.

Cleansing Ray.flavor: "The sun creates, sustains, and consumes so it can create again." —Caparocti Sunborn
Cleansing Ray.name: Cleansing Ray
Cleansing Ray.text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target Vampire.
• Destroy target enchantment.

Divine Verdict.flavor: Cunning warriors and dim-witted beasts alike fall under the church's harsh judgment.
Divine Verdict.name: Divine Verdict
Divine Verdict.text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

Everdawn Champion.flavor: "Undefeated in battle, she is the shining future our empire deserves." —Huatli
Everdawn Champion.name: Everdawn Champion
Everdawn Champion.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Everdawn Champion.

Exultant Skymarcher.flavor: "We have come at last to this holiest of holy places. What was stolen from us long ago is ours once again."
Exultant Skymarcher.name: Exultant Skymarcher

Famished Paladin.flavor: Loyal to his queen, slave to his thirst.
Famished Paladin.name: Famished Paladin
Famished Paladin.text:
Famished Paladin doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever you gain life, untap Famished Paladin.

Forerunner of the Legion.name: Forerunner of the Legion
Forerunner of the Legion.text:
When Forerunner of the Legion enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Vampire card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
Whenever another Vampire enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Imperial Ceratops.flavor: "The music of blades against its silver armor merely inspires it to bellow more full-throated melodies." —Huatli
Imperial Ceratops.name: Imperial Ceratops
Imperial Ceratops.text: Enrage — Whenever Imperial Ceratops is dealt damage, you gain 2 life.

Legion Conquistador.flavor: The Legion of Dusk sailed from Torrezon in search of glory, riches, and the Immortal Sun.
Legion Conquistador.name: Legion Conquistador
Legion Conquistador.text: When Legion Conquistador enters the battlefield, you may search your library for any number of cards named Legion Conquistador, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

Luminous Bonds.flavor: "Your part in this fight is done, vampire. Get used to your thirst."
Luminous Bonds.name: Luminous Bonds
Luminous Bonds.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

Majestic Heliopterus.flavor: "Its rise is like the sun's, a beautiful beginning. Its descent is like the sun's, a frightful ending." —Huatli
Majestic Heliopterus.name: Majestic Heliopterus
Majestic Heliopterus.text:
Flying
Whenever Majestic Heliopterus attacks, another target Dinosaur you control gains flying until end of turn.

Martyr of Dusk.flavor: "Should I fall, take up our standard and carry on. The Legion must always prevail."
Martyr of Dusk.name: Martyr of Dusk
Martyr of Dusk.text: When Martyr of Dusk dies, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

Moment of Triumph.flavor: "The time of salvation is at hand. Dusk washes over the world, and the Legion will rise immortal!"
Moment of Triumph.name: Moment of Triumph
Moment of Triumph.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

Paladin of Atonement.flavor: For every wound there is a blessing; for every death, a reckoning.
Paladin of Atonement.name: Paladin of Atonement
Paladin of Atonement.text:
At the beginning of each upkeep, if you lost life last turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Paladin of Atonement.
When Paladin of Atonement dies, you gain life equal to its toughness.

Pride of Conquerors.name: Pride of Conquerors
Pride of Conquerors.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If you have the city's blessing, those creatures get +2/+2 until end of turn instead.

Radiant Destiny.name: Radiant Destiny
Radiant Destiny.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
As Radiant Destiny enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1. As long as you have the city's blessing, they also have vigilance.

Raptor Companion.flavor: The abundance of foes in Orazca means the raptors no longer need any orders.
Raptor Companion.name: Raptor Companion

Sanguine Glorifier.flavor: For the Legion of Dusk, the Immortal Sun is a source of eternal life. When they reclaim it, they will no longer be forced to subsist on the blood of the wicked.
Sanguine Glorifier.name: Sanguine Glorifier
Sanguine Glorifier.text: When Sanguine Glorifier enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on another target Vampire you control.

Skymarcher Aspirant.name: Skymarcher Aspirant
Skymarcher Aspirant.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Skymarcher Aspirant has flying as long as you have the city's blessing.

Slaughter the Strong.flavor: "Cut the beasts out from under them and their strength is nothing." —Vona of Iedo, Butcher of Magan
Slaughter the Strong.name: Slaughter the Strong
Slaughter the Strong.text: Each player chooses any number of creatures they control with total power 4 or less, then sacrifices all other creatures they control.

Snubhorn Sentry.flavor: They're fun to train—if you like stubborn, aggressive, and fiercely territorial.
Snubhorn Sentry.name: Snubhorn Sentry
Snubhorn Sentry.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Snubhorn Sentry gets +3/+0 as long as you have the city's blessing.

Sphinx's Decree.name: Sphinx's Decree
Sphinx's Decree.text: Each opponent can't cast instant or sorcery spells during that player's next turn.

Squire's Devotion.name: Squire's Devotion
Squire's Devotion.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has lifelink.
When Squire's Devotion enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

Sun Sentinel.flavor: "I will not sleep until Orazca is ours once more."
Sun Sentinel.name: Sun Sentinel
Sun Sentinel.text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

Sun-Crested Pterodon.flavor: "Pterodons tolerate no intrusion into their skies. Even the clouds must ask permission." —Mahuiz, Sun Empire archer
Sun-Crested Pterodon.name: Sun-Crested Pterodon
Sun-Crested Pterodon.text:
Flying
Sun-Crested Pterodon has vigilance as long as you control another Dinosaur.

Temple Altisaur.flavor: "Kinjalli sculpted humans from clay, but the dinosaurs were carved from unyielding stone." —Itzama the Crested
Temple Altisaur.name: Temple Altisaur
Temple Altisaur.text: If a source would deal damage to another Dinosaur you control, prevent all but 1 of that damage.

Trapjaw Tyrant.flavor: "I would advise you not to struggle." —Huatli
Trapjaw Tyrant.name: Trapjaw Tyrant
Trapjaw Tyrant.text: Enrage — Whenever Trapjaw Tyrant is dealt damage, exile target creature an opponent controls until Trapjaw Tyrant leaves the battlefield.

Zetalpa, Primal Dawn.flavor: The sky takes flight and the earth trembles.
Zetalpa, Primal Dawn.name: Zetalpa, Primal Dawn
Zetalpa, Primal Dawn.text: Flying, double strike, vigilance, trample, indestructible

Admiral's Order.name: Admiral's Order
Admiral's Order.text:
Raid — If you attacked with a creature this turn, you may pay {U} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Counter target spell.

Aquatic Incursion.name: Aquatic Incursion
Aquatic Incursion.text:
When Aquatic Incursion enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 blue Merfolk creature tokens with hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
{3}{U}: Target Merfolk can't be blocked this turn.

Crafty Cutpurse.flavor: Possession is eleven-tenths of the pirate code.
Crafty Cutpurse.name: Crafty Cutpurse
Crafty Cutpurse.text:
Flash
When Crafty Cutpurse enters the battlefield, each token that would be created under an opponent's control this turn is created under your control instead.

Crashing Tide.name: Crashing Tide
Crashing Tide.text:
Crashing Tide has flash as long as you control a Merfolk.
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.

Curious Obsession.name: Curious Obsession
Curious Obsession.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card."
At the beginning of your end step, if you didn't attack with a creature this turn, sacrifice Curious Obsession.

Deadeye Rig-Hauler.name: Deadeye Rig-Hauler
Deadeye Rig-Hauler.text: Raid — When Deadeye Rig-Hauler enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, you may return target creature to its owner's hand.

Expel from Orazca.name: Expel from Orazca
Expel from Orazca.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If you have the city's blessing, you may put that permanent on top of its owner's library instead.

Flood of Recollection.flavor: Jace tumbled down the waterfall and plunged deep into his past.
Flood of Recollection.name: Flood of Recollection
Flood of Recollection.text: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Flood of Recollection.

Hornswoggle.flavor: Being a merciful pirate, she saved the vampire's gold from falling overboard.
Hornswoggle.name: Hornswoggle
Hornswoggle.text: Counter target creature spell. You create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."

Induced Amnesia.name: Induced Amnesia
Induced Amnesia.text:
When Induced Amnesia enters the battlefield, target player exiles all cards from their hand face down, then draws that many cards.
When Induced Amnesia is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owner's hand.

Kitesail Corsair.flavor: "Why perch in the crow's nest when I can fly like the crows?"
Kitesail Corsair.name: Kitesail Corsair
Kitesail Corsair.text: Kitesail Corsair has flying as long as it's attacking.

Kumena's Awakening.name: Kumena's Awakening
Kumena's Awakening.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, each player draws a card. If you have the city's blessing, instead only you draw a card.

Mist-Cloaked Herald.flavor: With matchless stealth, the River Heralds fought a running battle against the three enemy forces.
Mist-Cloaked Herald.name: Mist-Cloaked Herald

Negate.flavor: "As one, nature lifts its voice to tell you this: 'No.'"
Negate.name: Negate

Nezahal, Primal Tide.name: Nezahal, Primal Tide
Nezahal, Primal Tide.text:
Nezahal, Primal Tide can't be countered.
You have no maximum hand size.
Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, draw a card.
Discard three cards: Exile Nezahal. Return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

Release to the Wind.flavor: "Here and gone like a fleeting breeze."
Release to the Wind.name: Release to the Wind
Release to the Wind.text: Exile target nonland permanent. For as long as that card remains exiled, its owner may cast it without paying its mana cost.

River Darter.name: River Darter
River Darter.text: River Darter can't be blocked by Dinosaurs.

Riverwise Augur.flavor: "Time flows as the rivers do, toward an unknown sea. The wise know to look downstream."
Riverwise Augur.name: Riverwise Augur
Riverwise Augur.text: When Riverwise Augur enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

Sailor of Means.flavor: The rising tide of Orazca's plunder lifted all ships.
Sailor of Means.name: Sailor of Means
Sailor of Means.text: When Sailor of Means enters the battlefield, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."

Sea Legs.flavor: "When the waves pick up, either you find your feet or you lose your lunch."
Sea Legs.name: Sea Legs
Sea Legs.text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 as long as it's a Pirate. Otherwise, it gets -2/-0.

Seafloor Oracle.flavor: Where the light falls dim and blue on broken ships, secrets lie unclaimed.
Seafloor Oracle.name: Seafloor Oracle
Seafloor Oracle.text: Whenever a Merfolk you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

Secrets of the Golden City.flavor: Stolen knowledge can never be stolen back.
Secrets of the Golden City.name: Secrets of the Golden City
Secrets of the Golden City.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Draw two cards. If you have the city's blessing, draw three cards instead.

Silvergill Adept.flavor: "If you keep to the shallows, you'll never learn the secrets of the depths."
Silvergill Adept.name: Silvergill Adept
Silvergill Adept.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Merfolk card from your hand or pay {3}.
When Silvergill Adept enters the battlefield, draw a card.

Siren Reaver.name: Siren Reaver
Siren Reaver.text:
Raid — This spell costs {1} less to cast if you attacked with a creature this turn.
Flying

Slippery Scoundrel.flavor: "I'd rather be caught red-handed than leave empty-handed!"
Slippery Scoundrel.name: Slippery Scoundrel
Slippery Scoundrel.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
As long as you have the city's blessing, Slippery Scoundrel has hexproof and can't be blocked.

Soul of the Rapids.flavor: With Kumena in control of the Immortal Sun, the rapids rose from their riverbeds and the waterfalls took flight.
Soul of the Rapids.name: Soul of the Rapids
Soul of the Rapids.text:
Flying
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Spire Winder.name: Spire Winder
Spire Winder.text:
Flying
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Spire Winder gets +1/+1 as long as you have the city's blessing.

Sworn Guardian.flavor: For the River Heralds, the Immortal Sun is an object of terror and devastation. The idea that anyone would retrieve it for their own use is utterly abhorrent.
Sworn Guardian.name: Sworn Guardian

Timestream Navigator.name: Timestream Navigator
Timestream Navigator.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
{2}{U}{U}, {T}, Put Timestream Navigator on the bottom of its owner's library: Take an extra turn after this one. Activate this ability only if you have the city's blessing.

Warkite Marauder.name: Warkite Marauder
Warkite Marauder.text:
Flying
Whenever Warkite Marauder attacks, target creature defending player controls loses all abilities and has base power and toughness 0/1 until end of turn.

Waterknot.name: Waterknot
Waterknot.text:
Enchant creature
When Waterknot enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

Arterial Flow.flavor: "It is impious to admit, but I do enjoy pirate blood. Something in the salty tang of it, the spice of rebellion."
Arterial Flow.name: Arterial Flow
Arterial Flow.text: Each opponent discards two cards. If you control a Vampire, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

Canal Monitor.flavor: The first goblin tried to swim the canal. The second built a raft. The last and craftiest goblin launched herself from a firecannon and soared over the canal, trailing smoke. All were eaten, but only one was cooked.
Canal Monitor.name: Canal Monitor

Champion of Dusk.flavor: "Drench these golden streets in the blood of our enemies."
Champion of Dusk.name: Champion of Dusk
Champion of Dusk.text: When Champion of Dusk enters the battlefield, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of Vampires you control.

Dark Inquiry.flavor: "Your mind is no longer yours to waste."
Dark Inquiry.name: Dark Inquiry
Dark Inquiry.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

Dead Man's Chest.name: Dead Man's Chest
Dead Man's Chest.text:
Enchant creature an opponent controls
When enchanted creature dies, exile cards equal to its power from the top of its owner's library. You may cast nonland cards from among them for as long as they remain exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast those spells.

Dinosaur Hunter.flavor: "Aye, the foul beast chomped me, but I got away. You'd best believe when I find it again, it won't get away so easy."
Dinosaur Hunter.name: Dinosaur Hunter
Dinosaur Hunter.text: Whenever Dinosaur Hunter deals damage to a Dinosaur, destroy that creature.

Dire Fleet Poisoner.name: Dire Fleet Poisoner
Dire Fleet Poisoner.text:
Flash
Deathtouch
When Dire Fleet Poisoner enters the battlefield, target attacking Pirate you control gets +1/+1 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.

Dusk Charger.flavor: Stories say demon blood runs in its veins, making it fearless and bloodthirsty.
Dusk Charger.name: Dusk Charger
Dusk Charger.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Dusk Charger gets +2/+2 as long as you have the city's blessing.

Dusk Legion Zealot.flavor: Once they reached Orazca, the Legion's explorers ransacked tombs and temples, hunting for the Immortal Sun.
Dusk Legion Zealot.name: Dusk Legion Zealot
Dusk Legion Zealot.text: When Dusk Legion Zealot enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

Fathom Fleet Boarder.flavor: Without frequent raids, orcs sometimes get bored and plunder their own ships.
Fathom Fleet Boarder.name: Fathom Fleet Boarder
Fathom Fleet Boarder.text: When Fathom Fleet Boarder enters the battlefield, you lose 2 life unless you control another Pirate.

Forerunner of the Coalition.name: Forerunner of the Coalition
Forerunner of the Coalition.text:
When Forerunner of the Coalition enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Pirate card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
Whenever another Pirate enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses 1 life.

Golden Demise.name: Golden Demise
Golden Demise.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. If you have the city's blessing, instead only creatures your opponents control get -2/-2 until end of turn.

Grasping Scoundrel.flavor: "I can hear the plunder calling. It asks for me by name."
Grasping Scoundrel.name: Grasping Scoundrel
Grasping Scoundrel.text: Grasping Scoundrel gets +1/+0 as long as it's attacking.

Gruesome Fate.flavor: "You were keen enough to sink your fangs into us, vampire! And now you're afraid of a few little nibbles?" —Udvil "Ratty" Ratlock
Gruesome Fate.name: Gruesome Fate
Gruesome Fate.text: Each opponent loses 1 life for each creature you control.

Impale.flavor: Never let the glitter of gold distract you from the gleam of steel in the shadows.
Impale.name: Impale

Mastermind's Acquisition.flavor: Another piece of a nefarious puzzle.
Mastermind's Acquisition.name: Mastermind's Acquisition
Mastermind's Acquisition.text:
Choose one —
• Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
• Choose a card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand.

Mausoleum Harpy.name: Mausoleum Harpy
Mausoleum Harpy.text:
Flying
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Whenever another creature you control dies, if you have the city's blessing, put a +1/+1 counter on Mausoleum Harpy.

Moment of Craving.flavor: "The time of condemnation is at hand. Dusk washes over the world, and I consign you to eternal darkness!"
Moment of Craving.name: Moment of Craving
Moment of Craving.text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

Oathsworn Vampire.flavor: "My conquistadors are never slain, merely laid to rest." —Queen Miralda the Pious
Oathsworn Vampire.name: Oathsworn Vampire
Oathsworn Vampire.text:
Oathsworn Vampire enters the battlefield tapped.
You may cast Oathsworn Vampire from your graveyard if you gained life this turn.

Pitiless Plunderer.flavor: "Shame to let good gold go to the grave."
Pitiless Plunderer.name: Pitiless Plunderer
Pitiless Plunderer.text: Whenever another creature you control dies, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."

Ravenous Chupacabra.flavor: Opening Orazca unleashed more horrors than just the Immortal Sun.
Ravenous Chupacabra.name: Ravenous Chupacabra
Ravenous Chupacabra.text: When Ravenous Chupacabra enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls.

Reaver Ambush.flavor: Onora knew with sudden, grim certainty he would never see the Great River again.
Reaver Ambush.name: Reaver Ambush
Reaver Ambush.text: Exile target creature with power 3 or less.

Recover.flavor: "No more fear of death's oblivion—is this not the greatest treasure of all?" —Gurezan, Legion resurrectionist
Recover.name: Recover
Recover.text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Draw a card.

Sadistic Skymarcher.flavor: "I will catch you, child of the sun. I will drink your life and leave you a husk, discarded in the shadows."
Sadistic Skymarcher.name: Sadistic Skymarcher
Sadistic Skymarcher.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Vampire card from your hand or pay {1}.
Flying, lifelink

Tetzimoc, Primal Death.name: Tetzimoc, Primal Death
Tetzimoc, Primal Death.text:
Deathtouch
{B}, Reveal Tetzimoc, Primal Death from your hand: Put a prey counter on target creature. Activate this ability only during your turn.
When Tetzimoc enters the battlefield, destroy each creature your opponents control with a prey counter on it.

Tomb Robber.name: Tomb Robber
Tomb Robber.text:
Menace
{1}, Discard a card: Tomb Robber explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

Twilight Prophet.name: Twilight Prophet
Twilight Prophet.text:
Flying
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have the city's blessing, reveal the top card of your library and put it into your hand. Each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is that card's converted mana cost.

Vampire Revenant.flavor: "A thick fog obscures the port of Leor, but it's not thick enough to muffle the screams." —Admiral Beckett Brass
Vampire Revenant.name: Vampire Revenant

Vona's Hunger.name: Vona's Hunger
Vona's Hunger.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Each opponent sacrifices a creature. If you have the city's blessing, instead each opponent sacrifices half the creatures they control, rounded up.

Voracious Vampire.flavor: The purest devotion isn't the Blood Fast itself, but the craving that follows.
Voracious Vampire.name: Voracious Vampire
Voracious Vampire.text:
Menace
When Voracious Vampire enters the battlefield, target Vampire you control gets +1/+1 and gains menace until end of turn.

Blood Sun.flavor: As the struggle raged for control of the Immortal Sun, the world grew dark under a blood-red sky.
Blood Sun.name: Blood Sun
Blood Sun.text:
When Blood Sun enters the battlefield, draw a card.
All lands lose all abilities except mana abilities.

Bombard.flavor: "Want to sink a ship? Blow a hole in the hull. Want to kill a regisaur? Same answer." —Captain Brandis Thorn
Bombard.name: Bombard
Bombard.text: Bombard deals 4 damage to target creature.

Brass's Bounty.flavor: "Why squabble for trinkets when we could be living large off all this gold?" —Admiral Beckett Brass
Brass's Bounty.name: Brass's Bounty
Brass's Bounty.text: For each land you control, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."

Brazen Freebooter.name: Brazen Freebooter
Brazen Freebooter.text: When Brazen Freebooter enters the battlefield, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."

Buccaneer's Bravado.flavor: Never underestimate the power of panache.
Buccaneer's Bravado.name: Buccaneer's Bravado
Buccaneer's Bravado.text:
Choose one —
• Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn.
• Target Pirate gets +1/+1 and gains double strike until end of turn.

Charging Tuskodon.flavor: It doesn't hold grudges. It runs them down and impales them.
Charging Tuskodon.name: Charging Tuskodon
Charging Tuskodon.text:
Trample
If Charging Tuskodon would deal combat damage to a player, it deals double that damage to that player instead.

Daring Buccaneer.flavor: No ancient lore ties the pirates of the Brazen Coalition to the Immortal Sun. But it's a powerful ancient artifact in a city of gold—what's not to covet?
Daring Buccaneer.name: Daring Buccaneer
Daring Buccaneer.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Pirate card from your hand or pay {2}.

Dire Fleet Daredevil.name: Dire Fleet Daredevil
Dire Fleet Daredevil.text:
First strike
When Dire Fleet Daredevil enters the battlefield, exile target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard. You may cast that card this turn, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell. If that card would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

Etali, Primal Storm.flavor: The storm rages and the earth breaks.
Etali, Primal Storm.name: Etali, Primal Storm
Etali, Primal Storm.text: Whenever Etali, Primal Storm attacks, exile the top card of each player's library, then you may cast any number of nonland cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.

Fanatical Firebrand.flavor: "The Brazen Coalition is a firecannon pointed at our enemies. Goblins like him are the spark to its powder." —Admiral Beckett Brass
Fanatical Firebrand.name: Fanatical Firebrand
Fanatical Firebrand.text:
Haste
{T}, Sacrifice Fanatical Firebrand: It deals 1 damage to any target.

Forerunner of the Empire.name: Forerunner of the Empire
Forerunner of the Empire.text:
When Forerunner of the Empire enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Dinosaur card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
Whenever a Dinosaur enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Forerunner of the Empire deal 1 damage to each creature.

Form of the Dinosaur.name: Form of the Dinosaur
Form of the Dinosaur.text:
When Form of the Dinosaur enters the battlefield, your life total becomes 15.
At the beginning of your upkeep, Form of the Dinosaur deals 15 damage to target creature an opponent controls and that creature deals damage equal to its power to you.

Frilled Deathspitter.flavor: Nothing says trouble like a reedy hiss with a hint of liquid gurgle.
Frilled Deathspitter.name: Frilled Deathspitter
Frilled Deathspitter.text: Enrage — Whenever Frilled Deathspitter is dealt damage, it deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

Goblin Trailblazer.flavor: "Why are we following the goblin? Can he even read that map?" —Daphne Vail, Diremore first mate
Goblin Trailblazer.name: Goblin Trailblazer

Mutiny.flavor: Pirate captains rarely enjoy a peaceful retirement.
Mutiny.name: Mutiny
Mutiny.text: Target creature an opponent controls deals damage equal to its power to another target creature that player controls.

Needletooth Raptor.flavor: It hatches with its ferocity fully grown.
Needletooth Raptor.name: Needletooth Raptor
Needletooth Raptor.text: Enrage — Whenever Needletooth Raptor is dealt damage, it deals 5 damage to target creature an opponent controls.

Orazca Raptor.flavor: "If you come across a raptor in the city, stay perfectly still. At least then you'll be well rested when you die." —Captain Brandis Thorn
Orazca Raptor.name: Orazca Raptor

Pirate's Pillage.flavor: Goblins can carry their body weight in loot.
Pirate's Pillage.name: Pirate's Pillage
Pirate's Pillage.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards and create two colorless Treasure artifact tokens with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."

Reckless Rage.flavor: "Hard to starboard! Starb— Abandon ship! Abandon ship!"
Reckless Rage.name: Reckless Rage
Reckless Rage.text: Reckless Rage deals 4 damage to target creature you don't control and 2 damage to target creature you control.

Rekindling Phoenix.name: Rekindling Phoenix
Rekindling Phoenix.text:
Flying
When Rekindling Phoenix dies, create a 0/1 red Elemental creature token with "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature and return target card named Rekindling Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste until end of turn."

See Red.name: See Red
See Red.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has first strike.
At the beginning of your end step, if you didn't attack with a creature this turn, sacrifice See Red.

Shake the Foundations.flavor: A threefold calamity with a single will.
Shake the Foundations.name: Shake the Foundations
Shake the Foundations.text:
Shake the Foundations deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
Draw a card.

Shatter.flavor: Today it's a miracle of architecture, a marvel of stained glass, a symbol of the Legion's power. Tomorrow, driftwood.
Shatter.name: Shatter

Silverclad Ferocidons.flavor: "Control them? No. I gird them in armor and let them loose." —Yacha, Otepec huntmaster
Silverclad Ferocidons.name: Silverclad Ferocidons
Silverclad Ferocidons.text: Enrage — Whenever Silverclad Ferocidons is dealt damage, each opponent sacrifices a permanent.

Stampeding Horncrest.flavor: When the golden city opened, the dinosaurs inside were eager to greet the new visitors.
Stampeding Horncrest.name: Stampeding Horncrest
Stampeding Horncrest.text: Stampeding Horncrest has haste as long as you control another Dinosaur.

Storm Fleet Swashbuckler.flavor: "A bolt to the eye, a blade to the neck. That's the way to clear the deck!"
Storm Fleet Swashbuckler.name: Storm Fleet Swashbuckler
Storm Fleet Swashbuckler.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Storm Fleet Swashbuckler has double strike as long as you have the city's blessing.

Sun-Collared Raptor.flavor: "With Tilonalli's gifts, even the smallest of us can become great." —Huatli
Sun-Collared Raptor.name: Sun-Collared Raptor
Sun-Collared Raptor.text:
Trample
{2}{R}: Sun-Collared Raptor gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

Swaggering Corsair.flavor: "I'm about to make you famous. From the golden city to High and Dry, they'll talk about how fast you died!"
Swaggering Corsair.name: Swaggering Corsair
Swaggering Corsair.text: Raid — Swaggering Corsair enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked with a creature this turn.

Tilonalli's Crown.name: Tilonalli's Crown
Tilonalli's Crown.text:
Enchant creature
When Tilonalli's Crown enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has trample.

Tilonalli's Summoner.name: Tilonalli's Summoner
Tilonalli's Summoner.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Whenever Tilonalli's Summoner attacks, you may pay {X}{R}. If you do, create X 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens that are tapped and attacking. At the beginning of the next end step, exile those tokens unless you have the city's blessing.

Aggressive Urge.flavor: "Our lives, our homes, and all our history are at risk. Do not speak to me of peace."
Aggressive Urge.name: Aggressive Urge
Aggressive Urge.text:
Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Draw a card.

Cacophodon.flavor: When a cacophodon is angry, the whole jungle knows.
Cacophodon.name: Cacophodon
Cacophodon.text: Enrage — Whenever Cacophodon is dealt damage, untap target permanent.

Cherished Hatchling.flavor: Despite its appearance, it's anything but defenseless.
Cherished Hatchling.name: Cherished Hatchling
Cherished Hatchling.text: When Cherished Hatchling dies, you may cast Dinosaur spells this turn as though they had flash, and whenever you cast a Dinosaur spell this turn, it gains "When this creature enters the battlefield, you may have it fight another target creature."

Colossal Dreadmaw.flavor: "Remember when it was the most terrifying thing you'd ever seen?" —Captain Lannery Storm
Colossal Dreadmaw.name: Colossal Dreadmaw
Colossal Dreadmaw.text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

Crested Herdcaller.flavor: "Our survival, like theirs, depends on our ability to work together." —Huatli, to Tishana
Crested Herdcaller.name: Crested Herdcaller
Crested Herdcaller.text:
Trample
When Crested Herdcaller enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.

Deeproot Elite.flavor: "You think I stand alone? I have the forest at my call, the waters at my back. I outnumber you."
Deeproot Elite.name: Deeproot Elite
Deeproot Elite.text: Whenever another Merfolk enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target Merfolk you control.

Enter the Unknown.name: Enter the Unknown
Enter the Unknown.text:
Target creature you control explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on the creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)
You may play an additional land this turn.

Forerunner of the Heralds.name: Forerunner of the Heralds
Forerunner of the Heralds.text:
When Forerunner of the Heralds enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Merfolk card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
Whenever another Merfolk enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Forerunner of the Heralds.

Ghalta, Primal Hunger.flavor: The earth walks, strongest of all.
Ghalta, Primal Hunger.name: Ghalta, Primal Hunger
Ghalta, Primal Hunger.text:
Ghalta, Primal Hunger costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total power of creatures you control.
Trample

Giltgrove Stalker.flavor: "The only gold I need is the sheltering shimmer of the trees."
Giltgrove Stalker.name: Giltgrove Stalker
Giltgrove Stalker.text: Giltgrove Stalker can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

Hardy Veteran.flavor: For the Sun Empire, the Immortal Sun is a symbol of national identity. When they reclaim it, the Empire will flourish once more.
Hardy Veteran.name: Hardy Veteran
Hardy Veteran.text: As long as it's your turn, Hardy Veteran gets +0/+2.

Hunt the Weak.flavor: "Death lizard approaching, cap'n!" —Brint Doobin, last words
Hunt the Weak.name: Hunt the Weak
Hunt the Weak.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

Jade Bearer.flavor: "Sisora wore this, who defeated the tyrant of Azcanta, and before her Natena of Vuhana's band. May it bring you their strength."
Jade Bearer.name: Jade Bearer
Jade Bearer.text: When Jade Bearer enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on another target Merfolk you control.

Jadecraft Artisan.flavor: "A blade is not fully forged until it is given."
Jadecraft Artisan.name: Jadecraft Artisan
Jadecraft Artisan.text: When Jadecraft Artisan enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

Jadelight Ranger.name: Jadelight Ranger
Jadelight Ranger.text: When Jadelight Ranger enters the battlefield, it explores, then it explores again. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard. Then repeat this process.)

Jungleborn Pioneer.flavor: "We fought so long to hide this place. Let us be first to learn its wonders!"
Jungleborn Pioneer.name: Jungleborn Pioneer
Jungleborn Pioneer.text: When Jungleborn Pioneer enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 blue Merfolk creature token with hexproof. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Knight of the Stampede.name: Knight of the Stampede
Knight of the Stampede.text: Dinosaur spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

Naturalize.flavor: "Better to let the sword go than to lose the arm with it." —Captain Lannery Storm
Naturalize.name: Naturalize

Orazca Frillback.flavor: The frillbacks of Orazca soak up the sun on their tall spinal fins. They look slow and sleepy—until they catch the scent of prey.
Orazca Frillback.name: Orazca Frillback

Overgrown Armasaur.flavor: It embodies the riotous growth of the jungle, where creatures crowd upon creatures, where roots sprawl and vines swarm.
Overgrown Armasaur.name: Overgrown Armasaur
Overgrown Armasaur.text: Enrage — Whenever Overgrown Armasaur is dealt damage, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

Path of Discovery.name: Path of Discovery
Path of Discovery.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on the creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

Plummet.flavor: "Still, the pterodon chasing the clouds from its skies must bow to the great forest below." —Mahuiz, Sun Empire archer
Plummet.name: Plummet

Polyraptor.flavor: An innumerable pack is concealed in a single reflection.
Polyraptor.name: Polyraptor
Polyraptor.text: Enrage — Whenever Polyraptor is dealt damage, create a token that's a copy of Polyraptor.

Strength of the Pack.flavor: The pack that ambushes, eviscerates, and devours together stays together.
Strength of the Pack.name: Strength of the Pack
Strength of the Pack.text: Put two +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.

Swift Warden.flavor: A warning shout would take too long.
Swift Warden.name: Swift Warden
Swift Warden.text:
Flash
When Swift Warden enters the battlefield, target Merfolk you control gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Tendershoot Dryad.name: Tendershoot Dryad
Tendershoot Dryad.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
Saprolings you control get +2/+2 as long as you have the city's blessing.

Thrashing Brontodon.flavor: It cares more about preserving the herd's territory than about preserving itself.
Thrashing Brontodon.name: Thrashing Brontodon
Thrashing Brontodon.text: {1}, Sacrifice Thrashing Brontodon: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

Thunderherd Migration.flavor: The herds follow as new growth arises.
Thunderherd Migration.name: Thunderherd Migration
Thunderherd Migration.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Dinosaur card from your hand or pay {1}.
Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

Wayward Swordtooth.name: Wayward Swordtooth
Wayward Swordtooth.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
Wayward Swordtooth can't attack or block unless you have the city's blessing.

World Shaper.flavor: "The Great River will not be tamed."
World Shaper.name: World Shaper
World Shaper.text:
Whenever World Shaper attacks, you may put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.
When World Shaper dies, put all land cards from your graveyard onto the battlefield tapped.

Angrath, the Flame-Chained.name: Angrath, the Flame-Chained
Angrath, the Flame-Chained.text:
+1: Each opponent discards a card and loses 2 life.
−3: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step if it has converted mana cost 3 or less.
−8: Each opponent loses life equal to the number of cards in their graveyard.

Atzocan Seer.flavor: Streams of gold and bright feathers flash in the orb, visions of past and future.
Atzocan Seer.name: Atzocan Seer
Atzocan Seer.text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
Sacrifice Atzocan Seer: Return target Dinosaur card from your graveyard to your hand.

Azor, the Lawbringer.name: Azor, the Lawbringer
Azor, the Lawbringer.text:
Flying
When Azor, the Lawbringer enters the battlefield, each opponent can't cast instant or sorcery spells during that player's next turn.
Whenever Azor attacks, you may pay {X}{W}{U}{U}. If you do, you gain X life and draw X cards.

Deadeye Brawler.name: Deadeye Brawler
Deadeye Brawler.text:
Deathtouch
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Whenever Deadeye Brawler deals combat damage to a player, if you have the city's blessing, draw a card.

Dire Fleet Neckbreaker.flavor: The buccaneers scaled the sides of buildings as easily as they boarded enemy ships.
Dire Fleet Neckbreaker.name: Dire Fleet Neckbreaker

Elenda, the Dusk Rose.name: Elenda, the Dusk Rose
Elenda, the Dusk Rose.text:
Lifelink
Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Elenda, the Dusk Rose.
When Elenda dies, create X 1/1 white Vampire creature tokens with lifelink, where X is Elenda's power.

Winged Temple of Orazca.name: Winged Temple of Orazca
Winged Temple of Orazca.text:
(Transforms from Hadana's Climb.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{1}{G}{U}, {T}: Target creature you control gains flying and gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.

Hadana's Climb.flavor: Hadana seeks power in the service of peace.
Hadana's Climb.name: Hadana's Climb
Hadana's Climb.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then if that creature has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, transform Hadana's Climb.

Huatli, Radiant Champion.name: Huatli, Radiant Champion
Huatli, Radiant Champion.text:
+1: Put a loyalty counter on Huatli, Radiant Champion for each creature you control.
−1: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.
−8: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card."

Atzal, Cave of Eternity.flavor: . . . but every end is a new beginning.
Atzal, Cave of Eternity.name: Atzal, Cave of Eternity
Atzal, Cave of Eternity.text:
(Transforms from Journey to Eternity.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{3}{B}{G}, {T}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Journey to Eternity.flavor: Every journey has its inevitable end . . .
Journey to Eternity.name: Journey to Eternity
Journey to Eternity.text:
Enchant creature you control
When enchanted creature dies, return it to the battlefield under your control, then return Journey to Eternity to the battlefield transformed under your control.

Jungle Creeper.flavor: "You cannot kill it, not for long. It ripens where the ground is soaked with the blood of the slaughtered." —Atiuru, priest of the Verdant Sun
Jungle Creeper.name: Jungle Creeper
Jungle Creeper.text: {3}{B}{G}: Return Jungle Creeper from your graveyard to your hand.

Kumena, Tyrant of Orazca.name: Kumena, Tyrant of Orazca
Kumena, Tyrant of Orazca.text:
Tap another untapped Merfolk you control: Kumena, Tyrant of Orazca can't be blocked this turn.
Tap three untapped Merfolk you control: Draw a card.
Tap five untapped Merfolk you control: Put a +1/+1 counter on each Merfolk you control.

Legion Lieutenant.flavor: "We long ago abandoned the things that make humans weak: friendship, marriage, family. All that remains is the strength of our devotion."
Legion Lieutenant.name: Legion Lieutenant

Merfolk Mistbinder.flavor: "The mist clothes us when we are bare, hides us when we are alone, and unites us when we are together." —Nirit of Pashona's band
Merfolk Mistbinder.name: Merfolk Mistbinder

Metzali, Tower of Triumph.name: Metzali, Tower of Triumph
Metzali, Tower of Triumph.text:
(Transforms from Path of Mettle.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{1}{R}, {T}: Metzali, Tower of Triumph deals 2 damage to each opponent.
{2}{W}, {T}: Choose a creature at random that attacked this turn. Destroy that creature.

Path of Mettle.name: Path of Mettle
Path of Mettle.text:
When Path of Mettle enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each creature that doesn't have first strike, double strike, vigilance, or haste.
Whenever you attack with at least two creatures that have first strike, double strike, vigilance, and/or haste, transform Path of Mettle.

Tomb of the Dusk Rose.flavor: . . . resting in the splendor of the dead.
Tomb of the Dusk Rose.name: Tomb of the Dusk Rose
Tomb of the Dusk Rose.text:
(Transforms from Profane Procession.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{2}{W}{B}, {T}: Put a creature card exiled with this permanent onto the battlefield under your control.

Profane Procession.flavor: Vona sought a conqueror. Mavren sought a savior. Both found what they sought . . .
Profane Procession.name: Profane Procession
Profane Procession.text: {3}{W}{B}: Exile target creature. Then if there are three or more cards exiled with Profane Procession, transform it.

Protean Raider.flavor: Imitation is the sincerest form of piracy.
Protean Raider.name: Protean Raider
Protean Raider.text: Raid — If you attacked with a creature this turn, you may have Protean Raider enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

Raging Regisaur.flavor: Its breath is a gale. Its roar is a volcano. Its anger tears soul from flesh.
Raging Regisaur.name: Raging Regisaur
Raging Regisaur.text: Whenever Raging Regisaur attacks, it deals 1 damage to any target.

Relentless Raptor.flavor: As the battle for Orazca unfolded, the contenders discovered that others had already staked a claim.
Relentless Raptor.name: Relentless Raptor
Relentless Raptor.text:
Vigilance
Relentless Raptor attacks or blocks each combat if able.

Resplendent Griffin.name: Resplendent Griffin
Resplendent Griffin.text:
Flying
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
Whenever Resplendent Griffin attacks, if you have the city's blessing, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

Siegehorn Ceratops.flavor: To a siegehorn, there is no such thing as a dead end.
Siegehorn Ceratops.name: Siegehorn Ceratops
Siegehorn Ceratops.text: Enrage — Whenever Siegehorn Ceratops is dealt damage, put two +1/+1 counters on it. (It must survive the damage to get the counters.)

Storm Fleet Sprinter.flavor: "Charge like a red-hot cannonball straight to your target. You slow down, you sink." —Captain Lannery Storm
Storm Fleet Sprinter.name: Storm Fleet Sprinter
Storm Fleet Sprinter.text:
Haste
Storm Fleet Sprinter can't be blocked.

Vault of Catlacan.flavor: Swimming in coins proved harder than they'd hoped, but dancing was a jingling delight.
Vault of Catlacan.name: Vault of Catlacan
Vault of Catlacan.text:
(Transforms from Storm the Vault.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}: Add {U} for each artifact you control.

Storm the Vault.name: Storm the Vault
Storm the Vault.text:
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."
At the beginning of your end step, if you control five or more artifacts, transform Storm the Vault.

Zacama, Primal Calamity.name: Zacama, Primal Calamity
Zacama, Primal Calamity.text:
Vigilance, reach, trample
When Zacama, Primal Calamity enters the battlefield, if you cast it, untap all lands you control.
{2}{R}: Zacama deals 3 damage to target creature.
{2}{G}: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
{2}{W}: You gain 3 life.

Awakened Amalgam.name: Awakened Amalgam
Awakened Amalgam.text: Awakened Amalgam's power and toughness are each equal to the number of differently named lands you control.

Sanctum of the Sun.flavor: As soon as Jace laid eyes on the great sphinx's chamber, the shards of memory began sliding into place.
Sanctum of the Sun.name: Sanctum of the Sun
Sanctum of the Sun.text:
(Transforms from Azor's Gateway.)
{T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is your life total.

Azor's Gateway.name: Azor's Gateway
Azor's Gateway.text: {1}, {T}: Draw a card, then exile a card from your hand. If cards with five or more different converted mana costs are exiled with Azor's Gateway, you gain 5 life, untap Azor's Gateway, and transform it.

Captain's Hook.name: Captain's Hook

Gleaming Barrier.flavor: "Gold without freedom might as well be lead." —Angrath
Gleaming Barrier.name: Gleaming Barrier
Gleaming Barrier.text:
Defender
When Gleaming Barrier dies, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."

Gold-Forge Garrison.flavor: An army of living gold for the golden city.
Gold-Forge Garrison.name: Gold-Forge Garrison
Gold-Forge Garrison.text:
(Transforms from Golden Guardian.)
{T}: Add two mana of any one color.
{4}, {T}: Create a 4/4 colorless Golem artifact creature token.

Golden Guardian.name: Golden Guardian
Golden Guardian.text:
Defender
{2}: Golden Guardian fights another target creature you control. When Golden Guardian dies this turn, return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.

The Immortal Sun.name: The Immortal Sun
The Immortal Sun.text:
Players can't activate planeswalkers' loyalty abilities.
At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card.
Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Creatures you control get +1/+1.

Orazca Relic.name: Orazca Relic
Orazca Relic.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice Orazca Relic: You gain 3 life and draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have the city's blessing.

Silent Gravestone.flavor: Made to ward off the Grim Captain and silence the lure of undeath.
Silent Gravestone.name: Silent Gravestone
Silent Gravestone.text:
Cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities.
{4}, {T}: Exile Silent Gravestone and all cards from all graveyards. Draw a card.

Strider Harness.flavor: "Because the giant, implacable death lizard wasn't scary enough already." —Captain Brinely Rage
Strider Harness.name: Strider Harness
Strider Harness.text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has haste.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

Traveler's Amulet.flavor: "The best kind of treasure is the kind that leads to more treasure!" —Captain Lannery Storm
Traveler's Amulet.name: Traveler's Amulet
Traveler's Amulet.text: {1}, Sacrifice Traveler's Amulet: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

Arch of Orazca.name: Arch of Orazca
Arch of Orazca.text:
Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
{T}: Add {C}.
{5}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have the city's blessing.

Evolving Wilds.flavor: The Sun Empire bends nature—rivers, mountainsides, dinosaurs—to its unyielding will.
Evolving Wilds.name: Evolving Wilds
Evolving Wilds.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

Forsaken Sanctuary.flavor: In the galleon's grand cathedral, conquistadors swore vows of faith. In its wreckage, they swore vows of revenge.
Forsaken Sanctuary.name: Forsaken Sanctuary
Forsaken Sanctuary.text:
Forsaken Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.

Foul Orchard.flavor: The stench of rotting meat lures flies, goblins, and young raptors.
Foul Orchard.name: Foul Orchard
Foul Orchard.text:
Foul Orchard enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.

Highland Lake.flavor: "A place like this makes me wonder if there's more to life than blood and treasure . . . Nah." —Boyl Bucksalt, Storm Fleet swab
Highland Lake.name: Highland Lake
Highland Lake.text:
Highland Lake enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.

Stone Quarry.flavor: The Sun Empire's cities are built from the bones of the earth.
Stone Quarry.name: Stone Quarry
Stone Quarry.text:
Stone Quarry enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

Woodland Stream.flavor: Countless streams flow into the nine rivers, and the nine rivers flow into the Great River. The River Heralds guard them all.
Woodland Stream.name: Woodland Stream
Woodland Stream.text:
Woodland Stream enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

Vraska, Scheming Gorgon.name: Vraska, Scheming Gorgon
Vraska, Scheming Gorgon.text:
+2: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
−3: Destroy target creature.
−10: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain deathtouch and "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, that player loses the game."

Vampire Champion.flavor: "These pirates must answer for their ancestors, who renounced the Church of Dusk and sailed from Torrezon as heretics."
Vampire Champion.name: Vampire Champion
Vampire Champion.text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

Vraska's Conquistador.flavor: Abandoning both queen and church, he chose to follow power.
Vraska's Conquistador.name: Vraska's Conquistador
Vraska's Conquistador.text: Whenever Vraska's Conquistador attacks or blocks, if you control a Vraska planeswalker, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

Vraska's Scorn.name: Vraska's Scorn
Vraska's Scorn.text: Target opponent loses 4 life. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Vraska, Scheming Gorgon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

Angrath, Minotaur Pirate.name: Angrath, Minotaur Pirate
Angrath, Minotaur Pirate.text:
+2: Angrath, Minotaur Pirate deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.
−3: Return target Pirate card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
−11: Destroy all creatures target opponent controls. Angrath, Minotaur Pirate deals damage to that player equal to their total power.

Angrath's Ambusher.flavor: Orcs have been enemies of the Legion of Dusk since it was formed, and the entire race has been declared anathema.
Angrath's Ambusher.name: Angrath's Ambusher
Angrath's Ambusher.text: Angrath's Ambusher gets +2/+0 as long as you control an Angrath planeswalker.

Swab Goblin.flavor: Though small, goblins can hold their own in a fight. Foolhardy confidence goes a long way.
Swab Goblin.name: Swab Goblin

Angrath's Fury.name: Angrath's Fury
Angrath's Fury.text: Destroy target creature. Angrath's Fury deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Angrath, Minotaur Pirate, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

Cinder Barrens enters the battlefield tapped.
